snippet.title: Five Night at Freddy's 2 - Subtitle Update on Console
snippet.description:
Please subscribe to our channel for the latest FNaF news!

It's a brand new restaurant! This time we have the latest animatronics with amazing safety features, Nothing can go wrong.....right?

Five Nights at Freddy's 2 is now updated to include subtitles for English, French, German, Dutch, Spanish (Latin America), Italian, Portuguese (Brazil), Russian, Japanese, Chinese (Simplified), Korean. Change log below!

It's available now, If you speak one of these non-English languages please tell your friends to visit your favorite pizzeria! PLEASE NOTE: Fazbear Entertainment is not responsible for death or dismemberment.

Please follow our channel!

#MadeWithFusion #FNaF

Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/store/products/five-nights-at-freddys-2-switch/

Xbox: https://www.xbox.com/en-US/games/store/five-nights-at-freddys-2/9NBR2ZSD99FX/0010

Playstation: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/product/UP5549-CUSA17980_00-FNAF200000000000

XBox/UWP patch notes
- Revamped options screen
- Revamped pause screen
- Added subtitles options
- Improved office panning controls
- Moved vent lights to a separate button
- Fixed a bug that delayed putting on the mask
- Reduced loading times
- Fixed wrong control prompts showing in certain situations
- Various other bugfixes and improvements

PS4 patch notes
- Fixed an issue with a trophy
- Added support for mouse and keyboard controls
- Revamped options screen
- Revamped pause screen
- Added subtitles options
- Fixed vent lights incorrectly draining battery
- Restored Toy Bonnie figurine
- Improved Phone Guy audio
- Fixed an exploit with the mask and cameras
- Fixed an exploit with pausing
- Improved office panning controls
- Moved vent lights to a separate button
- Fixed a bug that delayed putting on the mask
- Various other bugfixes and improvements

Switch patch notes
- Added support for mouse and keyboard controls
- Revamped options screen
- Revamped pause screen
- Added subtitles options
- Fixed vent lights incorrectly draining battery
- Restored Toy Bonnie figurine
- Fixed an exploit with the mask and cameras
- Fixed an exploit with pausing
- Improved office panning controls
- Moved vent lights to a separate button
- Fixed a bug that delayed putting on the mask
- Various other bugfixes and improvements
